person.name: Hussain
person.story: I met Hussain as my tour guide during a souq tour in Doha. He has been living in Qatar for 11 years. He used to work as a civil engineer but left the profession due to a mental illness. Now, he is happy working in what he truly loves.

advice.text: The simple fact of being alive is amazing, and we should be grateful for it, enjoy life, and always try to make others' lives better.

person.name: Louise
person.story: I met Louise during a 4x4 desert tour in Doha. She is a South African woman who has traveled extensively. She is as a travel agent and has explored many parts of the world. She was in Doha for four days before continuing her journey to the UK.
